vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to cut, hew, chop, cut down, hew down, hew off, cut off, cut in two, shave off
1a) (Qal) to hew, chop in two
1b) (Niphal) to be chopped off, be hewn off
1c) (Piel) to cut off or down in two, hew off or down in two
1d) (Pual) to chop down, hew down
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   cortar; (b) nif.   ser cortado; (c) pi.   cortar, derribar; (d) pu.   ser cortado
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 劈, 砍, 砍下, 砍掉,
1a) (Qal) 砍, 砍成兩半
1b) (Niphal) 被砍去
1c) (Piel) 砍掉, 砍下, 砍成兩半
1d) (Pual) 砍倒 (賽9:9)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 劈, 砍, 砍下, 砍掉,
1a) (Qal) 砍, 砍成两半
1b) (Niphal) 被砍去
1c) (Piel) 砍掉, 砍下, 砍成两半
1d) (Pual) 砍倒 (赛9:9)
